title: Go Off with a Bang!
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu’s going to a lesson soon.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>A lesson?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu’s learning how to make traditional Japanese fireworks! There are lots of fireworks festivals in the summer, right? Lanzhu wants to have one here at Nijigaku too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Hey, just so we’re clear here, when you say “fireworks”, you’re talking about sparklers, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Of course Lanzhu’s talking about the ones that go off with a bang!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Wait, wait, wait. You do know those require you to take a difficult exam and get certified in them, right!? You don’t just go out and “learn” how to make them!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>So not even Lanzhu can?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Of course not. Let’s just go with regular sparklers. If we light them with everyone, they can be really fun too. Let’s go buy some.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>...Fine. Until Lanzhu gets certified, I guess we’ll just have to settle for sparklers. Alright, let’s give these sparklers our all! Come on, Mia!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Hey~! Don’t drag me into this~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
